price: Twebwe Allah, ntitwaremye amajuru n’isi hamwe n’ibiri hagati yavyo, kiretse ko Twabiremye mu kuri, kugira mumenye ko hariho Imana Rurema Allah, muheze muyisenge ari Imwe Rudende. Ni ukuri, igihe c’umuhero w’isi vuba bwango kirashika, kugira umuntu wese ahemberwe ivyo yakoze. Ntumwa y’Imana! Kubera ivyo rero, birabishe amaso wirengagize ibangamira ry’ababangikanyamana, ukwirengagiza kuzira umwidogo.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞۖ فَٱصۡفَحِ ٱلصَّفۡحَ ٱلۡجَمِيلَ

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā illā bil-ḥaqi wa-inna al-sāʿata laātiyatun fa-iṣ'faḥi al-ṣafḥa al-jamīla
